verbose_text: The proteolytic enzyme NEP, which is abundant in the human body XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, cleaves peptides on the amino side of hydrophobic amino acids, thereby inactivating a broad range of neuropeptides, including bombesin like peptides XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
evidence: side of hydrophobic amino acids, thereby inactivating a broad range of neuropeptides, including bombesin
